meanings.sent1: He felt sissier than usual when faced with the spider.
meanings.sent2: The boy's sissier behavior made him an easy target for bullies.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed sissier than him when it came to confronting the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: Her sissier nature was like a fragile glass that could shatter at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The dark forest at night made him feel sissier than he had ever felt before.

meanings.sent1: She was the sissier of the two sisters when it came to trying new things.
meanings.sent2: The storm made the dog even sissier than usual.
meanings.sent3: His sissier reaction to the horror movie made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sissier kitten hid behind the couch at the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent5: The sissier kitten hid behind the couch at the sound of thunder.
